# Trimly Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Trimly is a Web3-styled beauty & grooming ecosystem app built with Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Tailwind CSS
- Lucide React
- Framer Motion
- clsx / tailwind-merge

## Design Guidelines
- **Mobile-First:** Max-width 480px centered on desktop.
- **Theme:** Dark Mode base (#050505 background, #0F1115 surface).
- **Accents:** Electric Lime (#CCFF00) and Cyber Cyan (#00E5FF).
- **Visuals:** Glassmorphism, rounded corners, thin borders.

## Development Rules
- Use `npm` for package management.
- Follow the mobile-first layout structure in `app/layout.tsx`.
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling.
